moves.name: fire-pledge
moves.effect_entries: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

moves.effect_entries: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

movesDB.effect_entries: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

movesDB.name: submission
movesDB.effect_entries: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

movesDB.name: counter
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

movesDB.name: seismic-toss
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

movesDB.name: strength
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

movesDB.name: dragon-rage
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts 40 points of damage.

movesDB.name: fire-spin
movesDB.effect_entries: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

movesDB.name: earthquake
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

movesDB.name: toxic
movesDB.effect_entries: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

movesDB.name: rage
movesDB.effect_entries: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

movesDB.name: double-team
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

movesDB.name: smokescreen
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

movesDB.name: defense-curl
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: bide
movesDB.effect_entries: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

movesDB.name: fire-blast
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: swift
movesDB.effect_entries: Never misses.

movesDB.name: skull-bash
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

movesDB.name: fury-swipes
movesDB.effect_entries: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

movesDB.name: rock-slide
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

movesDB.name: slash
movesDB.effect_entries: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

movesDB.name: snore
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

movesDB.name: scary-face
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

movesDB.name: mud-slap
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

movesDB.name: outrage
movesDB.effect_entries: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

movesDB.name: false-swipe
movesDB.effect_entries: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

movesDB.name: fury-cutter
movesDB.effect_entries: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.

movesDB.name: steel-wing
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: attract
movesDB.effect_entries: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

movesDB.name: return
movesDB.effect_entries: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

movesDB.name: frustration
movesDB.effect_entries: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.effect_entries: Burns the target.

movesDB.name: facade
movesDB.effect_entries: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

movesDB.effect_entries: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

movesDB.effect_entries: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

movesDB.name: secret-power
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

movesDB.name: blaze-kick
movesDB.effect_entries: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: blast-burn
movesDB.effect_entries: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

movesDB.effect_entries: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.

movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

movesDB.effect_entries: Never misses.

movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts 40 points of damage.

movesDB.name: fire-spin
movesDB.effect_entries: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

movesDB.name: earthquake
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

movesDB.name: toxic
movesDB.effect_entries: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

movesDB.name: rage
movesDB.effect_entries: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

movesDB.name: double-team
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

movesDB.name: smokescreen
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

movesDB.name: defense-curl
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: bide
movesDB.effect_entries: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

movesDB.name: fire-blast
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: swift
movesDB.effect_entries: Never misses.

movesDB.name: skull-bash
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

movesDB.name: fury-swipes
movesDB.effect_entries: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

movesDB.name: rock-slide
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

movesDB.name: slash
movesDB.effect_entries: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

movesDB.name: snore
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

movesDB.name: scary-face
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

movesDB.name: mud-slap
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

movesDB.name: outrage
movesDB.effect_entries: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

movesDB.name: false-swipe
movesDB.effect_entries: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

movesDB.name: fury-cutter
movesDB.effect_entries: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.

movesDB.name: steel-wing
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: attract
movesDB.effect_entries: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

movesDB.name: return
movesDB.effect_entries: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

movesDB.name: frustration
movesDB.effect_entries: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

movesDB.name: dynamic-punch
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

movesDB.name: dragon-breath
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

movesDB.name: iron-tail
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: metal-claw
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

movesDB.name: hidden-power
movesDB.effect_entries: Power and type depend upon user’s IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

movesDB.name: twister
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

movesDB.name: crunch
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: ancient-power
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

movesDB.name: rock-smash
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: beat-up
movesDB.effect_entries: Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has.

movesDB.name: heat-wave
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: will-o-wisp
movesDB.effect_entries: Burns the target.

movesDB.name: facade
movesDB.effect_entries: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

movesDB.name: focus-punch
movesDB.effect_entries: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

movesDB.name: brick-break
movesDB.effect_entries: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

movesDB.name: secret-power
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

movesDB.name: blaze-kick
movesDB.effect_entries: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: blast-burn
movesDB.effect_entries: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

movesDB.name: weather-ball
movesDB.effect_entries: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.

movesDB.name: overheat
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

movesDB.name: rock-tomb
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

movesDB.name: aerial-ace
movesDB.effect_entries: Never misses.

movesDB.name: dragon-claw
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

movesDB.name: dragon-dance
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Attack and Speed by one stage.

movesDB.name: natural-gift
movesDB.effect_entries: Power and type depend on the held berry.

movesDB.name: fling
movesDB.effect_entries: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.

movesDB.name: flare-blitz
movesDB.effect_entries: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: air-slash
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

movesDB.name: dragon-pulse
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

movesDB.name: dragon-rush
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

movesDB.name: focus-blast
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

movesDB.name: shadow-claw
movesDB.effect_entries: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

movesDB.name: fire-fang
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

movesDB.name: captivate
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

movesDB.name: ominous-wind
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

movesDB.name: hone-claws
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Attack and accuracy by one stage.

movesDB.name: flame-burst
movesDB.effect_entries: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

movesDB.name: flame-charge
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

movesDB.name: round
movesDB.effect_entries: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.

movesDB.name: echoed-voice
movesDB.effect_entries: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

movesDB.name: sky-drop
movesDB.effect_entries: Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn.

movesDB.name: incinerate
movesDB.effect_entries: Destroys the target’s held berry.

movesDB.name: acrobatics
movesDB.effect_entries: Has double power if the user has no held item.

movesDB.name: inferno
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

movesDB.name: fire-pledge
movesDB.effect_entries: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

movesDB.name: bulldoze
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

movesDB.name: dragon-tail
movesDB.effect_entries: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

movesDB.name: work-up
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

movesDB.name: heat-crash
movesDB.effect_entries: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.

movesDB.name: hurricane
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

movesDB.name: confide
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

movesDB.name: mystical-fire
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

movesDB.name: power-up-punch
movesDB.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

movesDB.name: brutal-swing
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

movesDB.name: breaking-swipe
movesDB.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

movesDB.name: scale-shot
movesDB.effect_entries: Boosts the user’s Speed and lowers their Defense by one stage after inflicting damage two to five times in a row.

movesDB.name: dual-wingbeat
movesDB.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

movesDB.name: scorching-sands
movesDB.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
